updates.title: New Craft 2D Game & Arcade Updates
features: Craft 2D Game: Added a new 2D crafting and building game to the Arcade — place blocks, mine resources, and build creations in a sandbox environment.
improvements: Arcade-wide polish and minor fixes across all game pages.

updates.title: Middle School Course Experience Overhaul
features: Complete Middle School Course System: 6 new dedicated MS courses (Pre-Algebra, Algebra Foundations, Geometry, Physical Science, Chemistry Foundations, Life Science) with 6-8 units each, removing 70+ advanced HS-only lessons.
Dynamic Back-to-Course Navigation: Smart return tracking remembers whether students came from MS or HS course pages, ensuring they always return to the correct origin.
Middle School Quiz System: Reduced to 5 questions max (vs unlimited for HS), 3 attempt limit (vs 2), wrong-answer elimination, and automatic removal of 200+ HS-only advanced questions.
Curated Flashcards for Unit Tests: 41 unit test practice files now have `window.msFlashcards` with 15-25 MS-focused cards instead of 50-80 HS cards.
Easier Practice Games: Climb game gets +50% fuel and -50% gravity, match games reduced to 5-10 pairs instead of 20+, simpler feedback for younger students.
Auto-Select Easiest Video: MS students automatically see the introductory video first, reducing cognitive load.
One-Way Progress Sync (HS→MS Only): HS completion marks MS lesson complete, but MS completion does NOT affect HS progress, keeping MS isolated.
improvements: Fixed critical MS mode detection bug: `sessionStorage.courseOrigin` key was never being set, breaking ALL MS features (flashcards, quizzes, videos, games).
Added `data-hs-only='true'` attributes to 200+ advanced questions across 68 quiz and unit test files.
Python script `curate_ms_test_flashcards.py` automatically extracts and filters flashcards: max 5 per lesson, max 25 per unit.
MS course lesson filtering: Each of 6 MS courses includes only appropriate lessons (e.g., MS Algebra 1 Unit 3 includes 3.1, 3.2, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6 but skips 3.3).
Session storage improvements for reliable MS mode detection across all lesson types.
Geometry flashcard extraction now handles both single and double-quoted strings.
bugFixes: CRITICAL: Fixed `courseOrigin` key mismatch in taskbar.js — was storing `courseOrigin_ChemistryLessons` but all scripts read `courseOrigin` (null).
Fixed MS mode detection broken in practice_games.js, quiz_ui.js, lesson_video.js, and unit_test.js due to missing sessionStorage key.
Created 4 missing Chemistry Unit 5A/5B test files.
Fixed Geometry Unit 1-8 flashcard extraction failing due to quote style mismatch.
Fixed Biology Unit 5 gracefully handling missing Lesson 5.6 file.

updates.title: Middle School Courses & Login Revamp
features: Middle School Courses: Added 6 new middle school course pages — Pre-Algebra, Algebra Foundations, Geometry, Physical Science, Chemistry Foundations, and Life Science.
Courses Page Expansion: Middle School Mathematics and Middle School Science sections now appear on the Courses page.
Separate Login & Signup: Split the combined Login/Signup page into dedicated Login and Signup pages for a cleaner auth flow.
Translation Expansion: Added 1,000+ new Chinese, Hindi, and Spanish translations covering science lesson content.
improvements: Updated all navigation links across the app to point to the new Login page.
Adjusted course page layouts (min-height) for Algebra 1, Algebra 2, Biology, Chemistry, Geometry, and Physics to prevent content overflow.
Fixed several Geometry lesson summary pages with minor corrections.
bugFixes: Fixed broken login redirect links in Account Info, Preferences, Taskbar, and the landing page.
Resolved layout clipping issues on course listing pages at various screen sizes.

updates.title: Arcade & Session Overhaul
features: Unified Arcade Layout: All games now use a consistent SESSION sidebar and game card sizing for a cleaner experience.
Session Timer & Tokens: Play sessions now show a live countdown and can be extended using arcade tokens.
Auto-Pause Protection: Games automatically pause (and pause the session timer) when you switch tabs or windows.
Token Time Boost Buttons: New +50s / +100s / +200s blue buttons under the SESSION timer let you spend tokens to add time.
Lesson Completion Rewards: Completing a lesson quiz for the first time now grants +100 arcade tokens.
Quiz Completion Screen: New detailed completion screen shows time, accuracy, question breakdown, and any token rewards earned.
improvements: Removed legacy fullscreen/scale hacks that caused glitched game layouts.
Standardized pause overlays so auto-pause uses the same UI as pressing P in games.
Smoothed navigation between quizzes, practice, and the arcade for a more connected experience.
bugFixes: Fixed cases where the quiz completion screen would not appear for Unit-based lesson quiz files.
Resolved inconsistencies in how session time extensions updated the visible countdown.
Fixed rare layout overlaps between the arcade sidebar and game canvas on smaller screens.
